citeinfo.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 8 (1998) - Multilingual Nomenclature of Place and Oceanographic Names in the Region of the Okhotsk Sea : Report of the Physical Oceanography and Climate Committee : Reprint from a MIRC Science Report / edited by Yutaka Nagata and Vyacheslav B. Lobanov

descript.abstract: The multilingual problem of place and oceanographic names often occurs in the region of the Okhotsk Sea, especially in Souther Sakhalin (Minami Karafuto) and in the Kuril Islands (Chishima Islands) area, due to historical reasons. This report provides a list of nomenclature of bays, straits, currents in the Okhotsk Sea region in all the languages of PICES member countries. [ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.8. ISBN 0969842082 ]
descript.purpose: To compile multilingual nomenclature of bays, straits, currents in the Okhotsk Sea region.
